name: Global Congress On Nanotechnology
content: MomentEra is glad to welcome you all to the Global congress on Nanotechnology 2016 which will be held during November 21-23, 2016 in Dubai, UAE. Nanotech-2016 will be one of the largest international conventions of researchers, scientists, professors, and students in the field of Nanotechnology. The conference will give participants a platform to exchange ideas, discover novel opportunities, and broaden their knowledge. The main theme of the Nanotech-2016 conference is ” Building things from the bottom up, with atomic precision “. Nanotech-2016 is anticipating around the globe and the three day conference will include plenary sessions, keynote speeches, poster and oral presentations
